typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email3 as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		Email26 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageWEDF
SrcStageWEDF derive(NEW_Date_of_birth = '',
		Default = "") ~> DataCheckAndClean
DataCheckAndClean sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email3 as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		Email26 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DWHWEDF
